name: Dore Urgent Care Clinic and Dore House
description: The Dore Urgent Care Clinic is designed to offer clinical intervention for an individual who is experiencing an escalating psychiatric crisis and who requires rapid engagement, assessment, and intervention in order to prevent further deterioration into an acute crisis or grave disability. Based on the principles of social rehabilitation, it is a voluntary alternative to Psychiatric Emergency Services at San Francisco General Hospital. Dore House is a social rehabilitation-based acute diversion u

howToGetIt: Learn more about Dore Urgent Care Clinic and referral procedures by phoning (415) 553-3100. Your mental health clinician (such as a Psychiatrist, Therapist or Case Manager) needs to complete the referral process checklist. The Foundation does NOT accept self-referrals. For more information about services and referrals, contact the Mental Health Triage Coordinator, Maggie Krier Phone: 415-861-0828 ext 138 Email: mkrier@progressfoundation.org
